5#ifndef V8_COMPILER_SCHEDULER_H_
6#define V8_COMPILER_SCHEDULER_H_
7
8#include "src/base/flags.h"
9#include "src/compiler/node.h"
10#include "src/compiler/schedule.h"
11#include "src/zone/zone-containers.h"
12
13namespace v8 {
14namespace internal {
15
16class ProfileDataFromFile;
17class TickCounter;
18
19namespace compiler {
20
21// Forward declarations.
22class CFGBuilder;
23class ControlEquivalence;
24class Graph;
25class SpecialRPONumberer;
26
27// Computes a schedule from a graph, placing nodes into basic blocks and
28// ordering the basic blocks in the special RPO order.
29class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE Scheduler {
30 public:
31 // Flags that control the mode of operation.
32 enum Flag { kNoFlags = 0u, kSplitNodes = 1u << 1, kTempSchedule = 1u << 2 };
33 using Flags = base::Flags<Flag>;
34
35 // The complete scheduling algorithm. Creates a new schedule and places all
36 // nodes from the graph into it.
37 static Schedule* ComputeSchedule(Zone* temp_zone, Graph* graph, Flags flags,
38 TickCounter* tick_counter,
39 const ProfileDataFromFile* profile_data);
40
41 // Compute the RPO of blocks in an existing schedule.
42 static BasicBlockVector* ComputeSpecialRPO(Zone* zone, Schedule* schedule);
43
44 // Computes the dominator tree on an existing schedule that has RPO computed.
45 static void GenerateDominatorTree(Schedule* schedule);
46
47 const ProfileDataFromFile* profile_data() const { return profile_data_; }
48
49 private:
50 // Placement of a node changes during scheduling. The placement state
51 // transitions over time while the scheduler is choosing a position:
52 //
53 // +---------------------+-----+----> kFixed
54 // / / /
55 // kUnknown ----+------> kCoupled ----+ /
56 // \ /
57 // +----> kSchedulable ----+--------> kScheduled
58 //
59 // 1) InitializePlacement(): kUnknown -> kCoupled|kSchedulable|kFixed
60 // 2) UpdatePlacement(): kCoupled|kSchedulable -> kFixed|kScheduled
61 //
62 // We maintain the invariant that all nodes that are not reachable
63 // from the end have kUnknown placement. After the PrepareUses phase runs,
64 // also the opposite is true - all nodes with kUnknown placement are not
65 // reachable from the end.
66 enum Placement { kUnknown, kSchedulable, kFixed, kCoupled, kScheduled };
67
68 // Implements a two-dimensional map: (int, int) -> BasicBlock*.
69 using CommonDominatorCache = ZoneMap<int, ZoneMap<int, BasicBlock*>*>;
70
71 // Per-node data tracked during scheduling.
72 struct SchedulerData {
73 BasicBlock* minimum_block_; // Minimum legal RPO placement.
74 int unscheduled_count_; // Number of unscheduled uses of this node.
75 Placement placement_; // Whether the node is fixed, schedulable,
76 // coupled to another node, or not yet known.
77 };
78
79 Zone* zone_;
80 Graph* graph_;
81 Schedule* schedule_;
82 Flags flags_;
83 ZoneVector<NodeVector*>
84 scheduled_nodes_; // Per-block list of nodes in reverse.
85 NodeVector schedule_root_nodes_; // Fixed root nodes seed the worklist.
86 ZoneQueue<Node*> schedule_queue_; // Worklist of schedulable nodes.
87 ZoneVector<SchedulerData> node_data_; // Per-node data for all nodes.
88 CFGBuilder* control_flow_builder_; // Builds basic blocks for controls.
89 SpecialRPONumberer* special_rpo_; // Special RPO numbering of blocks.
90 ControlEquivalence* equivalence_; // Control dependence equivalence.
91 TickCounter* const tick_counter_;
92 const ProfileDataFromFile* profile_data_;
93 CommonDominatorCache common_dominator_cache_;
94
95 Scheduler(Zone* zone, Graph* graph, Schedule* schedule, Flags flags,
96 size_t node_count_hint_, TickCounter* tick_counter,
97 const ProfileDataFromFile* profile_data);
98
99 inline SchedulerData DefaultSchedulerData();
100 inline SchedulerData* GetData(Node* node);
101
102 Placement GetPlacement(Node* node);
103 Placement InitializePlacement(Node* node);
104 void UpdatePlacement(Node* node, Placement placement);
105 bool IsLive(Node* node);
106
107 // If the node is coupled, returns the coupled control edge index.
108 inline base::Optional<int> GetCoupledControlEdge(Node* node);
109 void IncrementUnscheduledUseCount(Node* node, Node* from);
110 void DecrementUnscheduledUseCount(Node* node, Node* from);
111
112 static void PropagateImmediateDominators(BasicBlock* block);
113
114 // Uses {common_dominator_cache_} to speed up repeated calls.
115 BasicBlock* GetCommonDominator(BasicBlock* b1, BasicBlock* b2);
116 // Returns the common dominator of {b1} and {b2} if it can be found in
117 // {common_dominator_cache_}, or nullptr otherwise.
118 // Not meant to be called directly, only from {GetCommonDominator}.
119 BasicBlock* GetCommonDominatorIfCached(BasicBlock* b1, BasicBlock* b2);
120
121 // Phase 1: Build control-flow graph.
122 friend class CFGBuilder;
123 void BuildCFG();
124
125 // Phase 2: Compute special RPO and dominator tree.
126 friend class SpecialRPONumberer;
127 void ComputeSpecialRPONumbering();
128 void GenerateDominatorTree();
129
130 // Phase 3: Prepare use counts for nodes.
131 friend class PrepareUsesVisitor;
132 void PrepareUses();
133
134 // Phase 4: Schedule nodes early.
135 friend class ScheduleEarlyNodeVisitor;
136 void ScheduleEarly();
137
138 // Phase 5: Schedule nodes late.
139 friend class ScheduleLateNodeVisitor;
140 void ScheduleLate();
141
142 // Phase 6: Seal the final schedule.
143 void SealFinalSchedule();
144
145 void FuseFloatingControl(BasicBlock* block, Node* node);
146 void MovePlannedNodes(BasicBlock* from, BasicBlock* to);
147};
148
149
150DEFINE_OPERATORS_FOR_FLAGS(Scheduler::Flags)
151
152} // namespace compiler
153} // namespace internal
154} // namespace v8
155
156#endif // V8_COMPILER_SCHEDULER_H_
